sn48.60:4.1: “Mendicants, these five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.
sn48.60:4.3: The faculties of faith, energy, mindfulness, samādhi, and wisdom.
sn48.60:4.4: These five faculties don’t arise to be developed and cultivated apart from the Holy One’s training.”
